inclusion.criterion: Patients with a body weight < 50 kg
inclusion.label: not_met

inclusion.criterion: No known defect of the coagulation system
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Normal pre-operative ROTEM values of the INTEM and FIBTEM
inclusion.label: unknown

inclusion.criterion: Patients with unimpaired renal function (creatinine clearance < 30 ml/kg/min)
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: Known defect of the coagulation system
exclusion.label: triggers

notes: Patient is a 55 year old man with lower urinary tract symptoms. He has normal blood chemistry and renal function, but has had recent surgery.
